name: Shred! Remastered
description:
Bust out sick tricks and gnarly combos in over 30 courses inspired by Mountain Bike culture, hand crafted by a solo Dev who lives and breathes Mountain Biking!

With flowy level design and addictive gameplay - every inch of trail will keep you on the edge and keep you coming back for more!

Shred! Remastered is a total remake of 2015's "Shred! - Downhill Mountainbiking"
